params.beneficiary: The address of the beneficiary that has claimed

params._merkleProof: the proof vor validating the beneficiary

params._PACTAddress: The address of the PACT token
params._cooldown: The minimum number of seconds between two claims
params._merkleRoot: The root of the merkle tree
params._startTime: The timestamp when the airdrop will be available
params._totalAmount: The total number of PACTs to be claimed by a beneficiary
params._trancheAmount: The number of PACTs to be claimed in one transaction

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

initialize(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Used to initialize a new Airdrop contract
